00027  * @brief Class for doing an additive adjustment based on a probe that
00028  * may be hybridizing to another allele
00029  * 
00030  */

00033 #define _PMSUMADJUST_H_

00047 /// String describing gc adjust algorithm/module
00048 #define PMSUMADJUSTSTR "pm-sum"
00049 
00050 /**
00051  *  Class for doing an adjustment based on the median intensity of probes
00052  * with similar GC content.
00053  */
00054 class PmSumAdjust : public PmAdjuster {
00055 
00056 public:
00057   
00058   /** Constructor. */
00059   PmSumAdjust(bool noMatchOk);
00060 
00061   /** 
00062    * @brief Constructor that takes the list of probe sets to remember
00063    * the pm/pm pairs.
00064    * 
00065    * @param layout - Annotation of probes on microarray.
00066    */
00067   void setLayout(ChipLayout &layout);
00068 
00069   /**
00070    * @brief Constructor that takes the list of probe sets to remember
00071    * the pm/pm pairs.
00072    *
00073    * @param board - blackboard with various state to access
00074    */
00075   void setParams(PsBoard &board);
00076   
00077   /** 
00078    * Subset of probes that should be loaded into memory representation.
00079    * @param probes - bitmask of probes to be used.
00080    */
00081   void setProbes(std::vector<bool> &probes);
00082 
00083   /** 
00084    * @brief Given a PM probe intensity add the matching PM intensity
00085    * for the other allele to the pmIntensity.
00086    *
00087    * @param probeIx - Index of probe in cel file data.
00088    * @param chipIx - Microarray or chip index.
00089    * @param iMart - IntensityMart which holds raw data.
00090    * @param iTrans - Vector of transformations that should be performed on raw data.
00091    * @param pmIintensity - Intensity of perfect match probe to be adjusted, may
00092    * be modified from original value depending on adjuster
00093    * @param bgrdAdjust - Background adjustment, if any, recommended (i.e. MM intensity)
00094    */
00095   void pmAdjustment(int probeIx, int chipIx, 
00096                     const IntensityMart &iMart, std::vector<ChipStream *> &iTrans, 
00097                     float &pmIntensity, float &bgrdAdjust);
00098 
00099   /** 
00100    * Fill in the information for Self documentation.
00101    * @param doc - Self documenter to be filled in.
00102    */
00103   static void setupSelfDoc(SelfDoc &doc);
00104 
00105   /** 
00106    * @brief Supply a little how/what/why about the algorithms this
00107    * class performs and what parameters it takes.
00108    * @return SelfDoc
00109    */
00110   static SelfDoc explainSelf();
00111 
00112   /** 
00113    * @brief This static function should be overridden by child classes
00114    * to return an object of the correct type initialized correctly
00115    * with the parameters in the string, string map. All objects
00116    * created this way should be deleted when finished using.
00117    * 
00118    * @param param - Map of key/value pairs to initialize the object.
00119    * 
00120    * @return Pointer toCreate object, this should be sub casted as necessary.
00121    */
00122   static SelfCreate *newObject(std::map<std::string,std::string> &param);
00123 
00124 private:
00125   /// If don't find matching allele probe to add ok to just add zero?
00126   bool m_NoMatchOk;
00127   /// Map of PM index on chip to PM probes from other allele index on chip.
00128   std::vector<int> m_Vec;
00129 
00130 };
